title: The Prince with Amnesia
description: Violet’s sure of three things:•	Its senior year and its time to date•	She’ll have to lie to do it•	She wants to date the hot new guy – KaiKai’s sure of three things: •	He has amnesia •	He’s recuperating in secret in America•	He wants to date VioletEver dated a hot guy with amnesia who turns out to be a prince in disguise? - Welcome to Violet’s senior year.Word Count: 40,981 words
author: Emily  Evans
